name: Project U.M.B.R.E.L.A.
description:
Ella, a young girl, is whisked away to a space station after discovering a secret in her father's office.  Equipped with nothing but a high tech umbrella, Ella will discover the cause of the crew's disappearance and the malfunctioning robots that now run the station.

We hope you enjoy this fun little experience. As a student project made in four months, only the first level is available.

The project is made in Unity.
